title: Tukiki and his search for a Merry Christmas
creator_credit: Pooled Film Services, Beryl Friesen, W.H. Stephens and Vic Atkinson
brief_description: An animated children’s film in which Tukiki, an Eskimo boy, sees Christmas celebrated all over the world. Uses beautiful xerox and pastel backgrounds throughout. Created and written by Christine Atkinson with the voice of Sterling Holloway.
